title: [Large-scale] Blended-based Language Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and relevant job-related practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered design considering the applicability of current practitioners' work, operating blended online-offline classes in a digital device-supported environment

learning_goals: Achieve over 85% proficiency in accurately constructing complex expressions when writing practical documents.
Successfully perform target-language-based communication in collaborative projects at least three times.
Complete the process of solving language-related problems using digital tools with over 90% participation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
